description: Details required for Condition 31 (Waste Management Plan) of planning permission 19/01228/FUL (Redevelopment of the site to provide 297 residential units in buildings ranging from 4 to 7 storeys, with 207 sq m commercial space (A1, A2, A3, A4, B1 and D1) at ground floor, 123 car parking spaces (including car club and accessible provision); communal landscaped amenity areas, secure cycle parking, stopping up of Avenue Terrace and other associated development)
